name: Learn Arabic - Phrasebook | Translator
description: Easily learn Arabic phrases and words! Speak Arabic with confidence!  The Learn Arabic app has many useful Arabic phrases and words (e.g., Thank you!, How much? or A table for two, please!). When you tap a phrase, the app speaks it aloud. There is no guessing as to how to pronounce the words. And if the app is talking too quickly for you, simply tap the snail icon to hear the words more slowly. Listen to pronunciation recorded by native Arabic speaker and then record and play back your own voice to practice your Arabic speaking skills!  When traveling to Arab (e.g., Dubai, Egypt or Abu Dhabi), make sure you bring the app with you! Ideally you listen to a phrase and repeat it, but if your accent is terrible, you can play the voice on the app to local Arabic people (e.g., a waiter or store clerk). Language barrier while travelling abroad will no longer exist!
